BAERCOIL


## M10 X 1.0 MF Baer® Die - 121401023 (P66)

**$22.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 10 x 1.0 - HSS

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. Round dies are cylindrical in shape and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to fasten the die in suitable die holder and holders by means of retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill press. The tap is made of high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS cutting dies can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 11 mm |
| Diameter | 10 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,394 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 10 |
| Pitch | 1,0 |
| Pitch in mm | 1 |
| Dimension | MF 10 x 1,0 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Height H | 11 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 30 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 10 x 1,0 |
| Diameter | 10 |

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 12 x 1.25 - HSS

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or to a drill. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The tap is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS cutting dies can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 12 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,472 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 12 |
| Pitch | 1,25 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,25 |
| Dimension | MF 12 x 1,25 |

| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 12 x 1.25 - HSS

It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². ## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die M 16 x 2.0 - HSS

BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and the special die holders also allow you to attach the round die to a tailstock or drill. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The tap is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS cutting dies can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 18 mm |
| Diameter | 16 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,63 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 16 |
| Pitch | 2,0 |
| Pitch in mm | 2 |
| Dimension | M 16 x 2,0 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

| Diameter | 16 |

| 1.0758 | 60SPb20 |

| Case-hardening steels |

| 1.7131 | 16MnCr5 |
| 1.5919 | 15CrNi6 |

| Quenched and tempered steels unalloyed |

View details

View details

We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and the special die holders also allow you to attach the round die to a tailstock or drill. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The tap is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS cutting dies can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². ## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 38 x 1.5 - HSS

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or drill press. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The tap is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS cutting dies can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 20 mm |
| Diameter | 38 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 1,496 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 38 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 38 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

## M38 X 1.5 BAER ROUND DIE 121401116

**$202.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 38 x 1.5 - HSS

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or drill press. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The tap is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS cutting dies can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 20 mm |
| Diameter | 38 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 1,496 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 38 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 38 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut M 16 x 2.0 - HSS

The hexagonal die (also called hexagon die nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The hexagon die nut is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 18 mm |
| Diameter | 16 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,63 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 16 |
| Pitch | 2,0 |
| Pitch in mm | 2 |
| Dimension | M 16 x 2,0 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 15,82 mm |
| Height H | 18 mm |
| Wrench size S | 41 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | M 16 x 2,0 |
| Diameter | 16 |

###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## M16 X 2 HEX DIE

**$54.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut M 16 x 2.0 - HSS

The hexagonal die (also called hexagon die nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The hexagon die nut is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 18 mm |
| Diameter | 16 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,63 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 16 |
| Pitch | 2,0 |
| Pitch in mm | 2 |
| Dimension | M 16 x 2,0 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 15,82 mm |
| Height H | 18 mm |
| Wrench size S | 41 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | M 16 x 2,0 |
| Diameter | 16 |

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut M 10 x 1.5 - HSS

The hexagonal die (also called hexagon die nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut M 10 x 1.5 - HSS

**$24.00** ~~~~

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut M 10 x 1.5 - HSS

The hexagonal die (also called hexagon die nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 22 x 1.5 - HSS

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. Round dies are cylindrical and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to secure the die in matching die stock and holders using retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill. The external thread cutting tool is made of high speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 16 mm |
| Diameter | 22 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,866 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 22 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 22 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 21,85 mm |
| Height H | 16 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 55 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 22 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 22 |

| Plastics |
| --- |

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M22 X 1.5 Baer Round Die

**$87.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 22 x 1.5 - HSS

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. Round dies are cylindrical and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to secure the die in matching die stock and holders using retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill. The external thread cutting tool is made of high speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 16 mm |
| Diameter | 22 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,866 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 22 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 22 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

| Height H | 16 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 55 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 22 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 22 |

BAER Round Cutting Die BSW 1/2 x 12 - HSS


**$33.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/baer-round-cutting-die-bsw-12-x-12-hss#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die BSW 1/2 x 12 - HSS

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or drill press. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 14 mm |
| Diameter | 1/2 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,5 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 12,7 |
| Pitch | 12 |
| Pitch in mm | 2,12 |
| Dimension | BSW 1/2 x 12 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | BSW: British Whitworth standard thread according to BS 84 |
| Tolerance | medium |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: medium](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

medium

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 12,56 mm |
| Height H | 14 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 38 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | BSW 1/2 x 12 |
| Diameter | 1/2 |

### Application – Sample materials for dies

| General construction steels |
| --- |
| 1.0035 | S185 (St33) |
| 1.0036 | S235JRH |
| 1.0039 | S235JRG1+CR |
| 1.0060 | E335 (St60-2) |

| Free-cutting steels |
| --- |
| 1.0718 | 11SMnPb30 |
| 1.0721 | 10S20 |
| 1.0726 | 35S20 |
| 1.0758 | 60SPb20 |

| Case-hardening steels |
| --- |
| 1.0401 | (C15) |
| 1.7016 | 17CR3 |
| 1.7131 | 16MnCr5 |
| 1.5919 | 15CrNi6 |

| Quenched and tempered steels unalloyed |
| --- |
| 1.0402 | C 22 |
| 1.1151 | C22E (Ck22) |
| 1.0503 | C 45 |
| 1.1191 | C45E (Ck45) |

| Pure copper, low-alloyed copper |
| --- |
| 2.0240 | CuZn15 |
| 2.0265 | CuZn30 |

| Copper-tin alloy (bronze) short-chipping |
| --- |
| 2.1090.01 | G-CuSn7ZnPb |
| 2.1086.01 | G-CuSn10Zn |

| Plastics |
| --- |
| PMMA |
| POM |
| PVC |

## BAER Round Cutting Die BSW 1/2 x 12 - HSS

**$33.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die BSW 1/2 x 12 - HSS

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or drill press. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die G (BSP) 1/8 x 28 - HSS

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or drill press. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

| Standard | DIN 5158 |
| Material | HSS |

BAERCOIL


## 1/8" x 28 BSP Baer® Round Die 262541214

**$15.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die G (BSP) 1/8 x 28 - HSS

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or drill press. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 11 mm |
| Diameter | 1/8 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,383 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 9,73 |
| Pitch | 28 |
| Pitch in mm | 0,907 |
| Dimension | G (BSP) 1/8 x 28 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | G (BSP): British Standard Pipe Thread according to DIN ISO 228 - Cylindrical pipe thread |
| Tolerance | A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 5158 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

A

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 9,62 mm |
| Height H | 11 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 30 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | G (BSP) 1/8 x 28 |
| Diameter | 1/8 |

| --- |

| POM |

## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut G (BSP) 1/8 x 28 - HSS

The hexagonal die (also called hexagon die nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 11 mm |
| Diameter | 1/8 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,383 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 9,73 |
| Pitch | 28 |
| Pitch in mm | 0,907 |
| Dimension | G (BSP) 1/8 x 28 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | G (BSP): British Standard Pipe Thread according to DIN ISO 228 - Cylindrical pipe thread |
| Tolerance | A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

A

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 9,62 mm |
| Height H | 11 mm |

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die M 10 x 1.5 - HSS - tolerance 6e

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or to a drill. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 11 mm |
| Diameter | 10 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,394 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 10 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | M 10 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | 6e Untermaß |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: 6e Undersize](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

6e Undersize

### Applications

- Undersize- tolerance: for studs that receive a surface treatment or galvanic protective layer up to approx. 8 µm layer thickness. Dies with 6e- tolerance cut approx. 0.03 mm smaller than dies with standard tolerance 6g.
- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin-alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC etc.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 9,81 mm |
| Height H | 11 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 30 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | M 10 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 10 |

| 1.0036 | S235JRH |
| 1.0039 | S235JRG1+CR |
| 1.0060 | E335 (St60-2) |

| 1.0758 | 60SPb20 |

| 1.5919 | 15CrNi6 |

| Quenched and tempered steels unalloyed |
| --- |

| 1.1151 | C22E (Ck22) |

| 1.1191 | C45E (Ck45) |

| Pure copper, low-alloyed copper |
| --- |
| 2.0240 | CuZn15 |
| 2.0265 | CuZn30 |

| Copper-tin alloy (bronze) short-chipping |
| --- |
| 2.1090.01 | G-CuSn7ZnPb |
| 2.1086.01 | G-CuSn10Zn |

| Plastics |
| --- |
| PMMA |
| POM |
| PVC |

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M10 X 1.5 BAER ROUND DIE - 262744601 (P36)

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die M 10 x 1.5 - HSS - tolerance 6e

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or to a drill. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

| Diameter | 10 |

BAER Round Cutting Die MF 12 x 0.5 - HSS


**$36.00** ~~~~

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 12 x 0.5 - HSS

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. Round dies are cylindrical and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to secure the die in matching die stock and holders using retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill press. The tap is made of high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS cutting dies can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 12 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,4724409 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 12 |
| Pitch | 0,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 0,5 |
| Dimension | MF 12 x 0,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 11,93 mm |
| Height H | 10 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 38 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 12 x 0,5 |
| Diameter | 12 |

### Application – Sample materials for dies

| General construction steels |
| --- |
| 1.0035 | S185 (St33) |
| 1.0036 | S235JRH |
| 1.0039 | S235JRG1+CR |
| 1.0060 | E335 (St60-2) |

| Free-cutting steels |
| --- |
| 1.0718 | 11SMnPb30 |
| 1.0721 | 10S20 |
| 1.0726 | 35S20 |
| 1.0758 | 60SPb20 |

| Case-hardening steels |
| --- |

BAERCOIL


## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 12 x 0.5 - HSS

**$36.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 12 x 0.5 - HSS

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. Round dies are cylindrical and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to secure the die in matching die stock and holders using retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill press. The tap is made of high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS cutting dies can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 12 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,4724409 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 12 |
| Pitch | 0,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 0,5 |
| Dimension | MF 12 x 0,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

| Diameter | 12 |

## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut G (BSP) 1/2 x 14 - HSS

The hexagonal die (also called hexagonal cutting nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. This metal-cutting tap has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The hexagon die nut is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 14 mm |
| Diameter | 1/2 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,825 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 20,95 |
| Pitch | 14 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,814 |
| Dimension | G (BSP) 1/2 x 14 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | G (BSP): British Standard Pipe Thread according to DIN ISO 228 - Cylindrical pipe thread |
| Tolerance | A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

A

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 20,81 mm |
| Height H | 14 mm |
| Wrench size S | 41 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | G (BSP) 1/2 x 14 |
| Diameter | 1/2 |

## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut UNC 3/8 x 16 - HSS

The hexagon die nut is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, making it easier to reach inaccessible places. BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. This thread cutting nut has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 11 mm |
| Diameter | 3/8 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,375 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 9,525 |
| Pitch | 16 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,587 |
| Dimension | UNC 3/8 x 16 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Tolerance | 2A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: 2A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

2A

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Diameter | 3/8 |

M20 X 1 ROUND BAER DIE

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 20 x 1.0 - HSS

* * *

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or to a drill. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 14 mm |
| Diameter | 20 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,787 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 20 |
| Pitch | 1,0 |
| Pitch in mm | 1 |
| Dimension | MF 20 x 1,0 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 19,88 mm |
| Height H | 14 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 45 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 20 x 1,0 |
| Diameter | 20 |

### Application – Sample materials for dies

| General construction steels |
| --- |
| 1.0035 | S185 (St33) |
| 1.0036 | S235JRH |
| 1.0039 | S235JRG1+CR |
| 1.0060 | E335 (St60-2) |

| Free-cutting steels |
| --- |
| 1.0718 | 11SMnPb30 |
| 1.0721 | 10S20 |
| 1.0726 | 35S20 |
| 1.0758 | 60SPb20 |

| Case-hardening steels |
| --- |
| 1.0401 | (C15) |
| 1.7016 | 17CR3 |
| 1.7131 | 16MnCr5 |
| 1.5919 | 15CrNi6 |

| Quenched and tempered steels unalloyed |
| --- |
| 1.0402 | C 22 |
| 1.1151 | C22E (Ck22) |
| 1.0503 | C 45 |
| 1.1191 | C45E (Ck45) |

| Pure copper, low-alloyed copper |
| --- |
| 2.0240 | CuZn15 |
| 2.0265 | CuZn30 |

| Copper-tin alloy (bronze) short-chipping |
| --- |
| 2.1090.01 | G-CuSn7ZnPb |
| 2.1086.01 | G-CuSn10Zn |

| Plastics |
| --- |
| PMMA |
| POM |
| PVC |

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## M20 X 1 ROUND BAER DIE

**$53.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 20 x 1.0 - HSS

* * *

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or to a drill. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 14 mm |
| Diameter | 20 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,787 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 20 |
| Pitch | 1,0 |
| Pitch in mm | 1 |
| Dimension | MF 20 x 1,0 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 19,88 mm |
| Height H | 14 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 45 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 20 x 1,0 |
| Diameter | 20 |

### Application – Sample materials for dies

| General construction steels |
| --- |
| 1.0035 | S185 (St33) |
| 1.0036 | S235JRH |
| 1.0039 | S235JRG1+CR |
| 1.0060 | E335 (St60-2) |

| Free-cutting steels |
| --- |
| 1.0718 | 11SMnPb30 |
| 1.0721 | 10S20 |
| 1.0726 | 35S20 |
| 1.0758 | 60SPb20 |

| Case-hardening steels |
| --- |
| 1.0401 | (C15) |
| 1.7016 | 17CR3 |
| 1.7131 | 16MnCr5 |
| 1.5919 | 15CrNi6 |

| Quenched and tempered steels unalloyed |
| --- |
| 1.0402 | C 22 |
| 1.1151 | C22E (Ck22) |
| 1.0503 | C 45 |
| 1.1191 | C45E (Ck45) |

| Pure copper, low-alloyed copper |
| --- |
| 2.0240 | CuZn15 |
| 2.0265 | CuZn30 |

| Copper-tin alloy (bronze) short-chipping |
| --- |
| 2.1090.01 | G-CuSn7ZnPb |
| 2.1086.01 | G-CuSn10Zn |

| Plastics |
| --- |
| PMMA |
| POM |
| PVC |

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die NPT 1/2 x 14 - HSS

* * *

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or drill press. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 18 mm |
| Diameter | 1/2 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 21,22 |
| Pitch | 14 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,81 |
| Dimension | NPT 1/2 x 14 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | NPT: National Pipe Thread or American pipe thread according to ANSI B 1.20.1 |
| Tolerance | medium |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: medium](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

medium

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing round die with conical thread](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/b1/7d/38/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen_konische_Gewinde.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 20,63 x 16,8 mm |
| Height H | 18 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 45 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | NPT 1/2 x 14 |
| Diameter | 1/2 |

| --- |

## NPT 1/2 x 14 - HSS BAER Round Cutting Die

**$136.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die NPT 1/2 x 14 - HSS

* * *

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. The die holder is used to cut the threads by hand and with the special die holders you can also attach the round die to a tailstock or drill press. The dies can usually be used on both sides and have a perfect cut. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 18 mm |
| Diameter | 1/2 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 21,22 |
| Pitch | 14 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,81 |
| Dimension | NPT 1/2 x 14 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | NPT: National Pipe Thread or American pipe thread according to ANSI B 1.20.1 |
| Tolerance | medium |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 - HSS

* * *

The hexagonal die (also called hexagonal cutting nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. This metal-cutting tap has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,518 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 13,16 |
| Pitch | 19 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,337 |
| Dimension | G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | G (BSP): British Standard Pipe Thread according to DIN ISO 228 - Cylindrical pipe thread |
| Tolerance | A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

A

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing Hexagon Die Nut](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 13,03 mm |
| Height H | 10 mm |
| Wrench size S | 36 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 |
| Diameter | 1/4 |

1/4 x 19 - BAER Round Cutting Die G (BSP) HSSE spiral entry

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/14-x-19-baer-round-cutting-die-g-bsp-hsse-spiral-entry#product-info)
