## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 - HSSE spiral entry

* * *

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. Round dies are cylindrical in shape and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to fasten the die in suitable die holder and holders by means of retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill. The die is made of the high-quality high-speed steel HSSE. HSSE is more heat-resistant, more wear-resistant and has a slightly higher hardness than HSS steel. the round die is therefore more durable and can also be used for demanding tasks. The improved surface finish, the spiral entry and the basic material HSSE give you the necessary strength for working with difficult-to-cut materials and stainless steels. The cutting tool also has a special cutting edge geometry so that it can be used in metalworking for, among other things, tempering and case-hardening steels up to 1200 N/mm², as well as stainless and acid-resistant steels, heat-resistant structural steels and malleable cast iron. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,518 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 13,16 |
| Pitch | 19 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,337 |
| Dimension | G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | G (BSP): British Standard Pipe Thread according to DIN ISO 228 - Cylindrical pipe thread |
| Tolerance | A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 5158 |
| Material | HSSE |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Form](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/21/f8/b6/schneideisen_schaelanschnitt.svg)

**Form / Geometry**

with spiral entry (spiral point)

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

2,0

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSSE

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

A

### Applications

- Tempering and case-hardening steels up to 1200 N/mm²
- stainless and acid-resistant steels (VA materials)
- and for general use

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing round die](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 13,16 mm |
| Height H | 10 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 38 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 |
| Diameter | 1/4 |

### Payment & Security

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## 1/4 x 19 - BAER Round Cutting Die G (BSP) HSSE spiral entry

**$56.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 - HSSE spiral entry

* * *

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. Round dies are cylindrical in shape and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to fasten the die in suitable die holder and holders by means of retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill. The die is made of the high-quality high-speed steel HSSE. HSSE is more heat-resistant, more wear-resistant and has a slightly higher hardness than HSS steel. the round die is therefore more durable and can also be used for demanding tasks. The improved surface finish, the spiral entry and the basic material HSSE give you the necessary strength for working with difficult-to-cut materials and stainless steels. The cutting tool also has a special cutting edge geometry so that it can be used in metalworking for, among other things, tempering and case-hardening steels up to 1200 N/mm², as well as stainless and acid-resistant steels, heat-resistant structural steels and malleable cast iron. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,518 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 13,16 |
| Pitch | 19 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,337 |
| Dimension | G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | G (BSP): British Standard Pipe Thread according to DIN ISO 228 - Cylindrical pipe thread |
| Tolerance | A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 5158 |
| Material | HSSE |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Form](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/21/f8/b6/schneideisen_schaelanschnitt.svg)

**Form / Geometry**

with spiral entry (spiral point)

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

2,0

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSSE

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

A

### Applications

- Tempering and case-hardening steels up to 1200 N/mm²
- stainless and acid-resistant steels (VA materials)
- and for general use

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing round die](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Diameter | 1/4 |

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 - HSS

* * *

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. Round dies are cylindrical in shape and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to fasten the die in suitable die holder and holders by means of retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill. The external thread cutting tool is made of high speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,518 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 13,16 |
| Pitch | 19 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,337 |
| Dimension | G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | G (BSP): British Standard Pipe Thread according to DIN ISO 228 - Cylindrical pipe thread |
| Tolerance | A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 5158 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

A

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing round die](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 13,03 mm |
| Height H | 10 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 38 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 |
| Diameter | 1/4 |

BAERCOIL


## 1/4 x 19 Baer Round Cutting Die G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 - HSS

**$25.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 - HSS

* * *

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. Round dies are cylindrical in shape and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to fasten the die in suitable die holder and holders by means of retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill. The external thread cutting tool is made of high speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,518 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 13,16 |
| Pitch | 19 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,337 |
| Dimension | G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | G (BSP): British Standard Pipe Thread according to DIN ISO 228 - Cylindrical pipe thread |
| Tolerance | A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 5158 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

A

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing round die](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 13,03 mm |
| Height H | 10 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 38 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | G (BSP) 1/4 x 19 |
| Diameter | 1/4 |

| --- |

| POM |
| PVC |

## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut MF 30 x 1.5 - HSS

* * *

The hexagon die nut is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring or open-end spanners, making it easier to reach inaccessible places. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The hexagon die nut is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 18 mm |
| Diameter | 30 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 1,181 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 30 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 30 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing Hexagon Die Nut](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 29,85 mm |
| Height H | 18 mm |
| Wrench size S | 60 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 30 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 30 |

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

MF 24 x 1.5 BAER Round Cutting Die - LEFT - HSS

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 24 x 1.5 - LEFT - HSS

* * *

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Cutting dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. This is a left-hand cutting die that can be used to make left-hand thread. Round dies are cylindrical and are used to make external threads in one operation. On the outer casing of the round die there are four holes and a groove which are used to fix the die in suitable die holder and holders by means of retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill press. The tap is made of high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS cutting dies can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 16 mm |
| Diameter | 24 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,945 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 24 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 24 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Left |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing round die](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 23,85 mm |
| Height H | 16 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 55 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 24 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 24 |

### Application – Sample materials for dies

| General construction steels |
| --- |
| 1.0035 | S185 (St33) |
| 1.0036 | S235JRH |
| 1.0039 | S235JRG1+CR |
| 1.0060 | E335 (St60-2) |

| Free-cutting steels |
| --- |
| 1.0718 | 11SMnPb30 |
| 1.0721 | 10S20 |
| 1.0726 | 35S20 |
| 1.0758 | 60SPb20 |

| Case-hardening steels |
| --- |
| 1.0401 | (C15) |
| 1.7016 | 17CR3 |
| 1.7131 | 16MnCr5 |
| 1.5919 | 15CrNi6 |

| Quenched and tempered steels unalloyed |
| --- |
| 1.0402 | C 22 |
| 1.1151 | C22E (Ck22) |
| 1.0503 | C 45 |
| 1.1191 | C45E (Ck45) |

| Pure copper, low-alloyed copper |
| --- |
| 2.0240 | CuZn15 |
| 2.0265 | CuZn30 |

| Copper-tin alloy (bronze) short-chipping |
| --- |
| 2.1090.01 | G-CuSn7ZnPb |
| 2.1086.01 | G-CuSn10Zn |

| Plastics |
| --- |
| PMMA |
| POM |
| PVC |

## MF 24 x 1.5 BAER Round Cutting Die - LEFT - HSS

**$145.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 24 x 1.5 - LEFT - HSS

* * *

BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges receive the chips, roll them and discharge them. Cutting dies are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. This is a left-hand cutting die that can be used to make left-hand thread. Round dies are cylindrical and are used to make external threads in one operation. On the outer casing of the round die there are four holes and a groove which are used to fix the die in suitable die holder and holders by means of retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill press. The tap is made of high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS cutting dies can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

| Height H | 16 mm |
| Diameter | 24 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,945 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 24 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 24 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Left |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²

## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut MF 22 x 1.5 - HSS

* * *

The hexagonal die (also called hexagon die nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 16 mm |
| Diameter | 22 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,866 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 22 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 22 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing Hexagon Die Nut](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 21,85 mm |
| Height H | 16 mm |
| Wrench size S | 50 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 22 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 22 |

### Further information

- [MF - ISO metric fine thread DIN 13](http://www.gewindebohrer.de/shoptabellen/mf_en.html)
- [Tolerances for dies, terms and dimension explanation](https://www.gewindebohrer.de/shoptabellen/pop_up_toleranzen_se_english.html)
- [Information on bolt pre-machining diameter](https://www.gewindebohrer.de/shoptabellen/blank_diameter_tolerances.html)
- [Guide values for cutting speed, cooling lubricant and rake angle](https://www.gewindebohrer.de/en/service/technische-daten/cutting-iron-cutting-speed)

### Safety instructions

- [Information on the EU General Product Safety Regulation (GPSR)](https://baer.tools/en/navigation/0193b1f5df9a730ca17ba750ed133848)

BAERCOIL


## M22 x 1.5 BAER Hexagon Die Nut MF - HSS

**$140.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut MF 22 x 1.5 - HSS

* * *

The hexagonal die (also called hexagon die nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 16 mm |
| Diameter | 22 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,866 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 22 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 22 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing Hexagon Die Nut](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 21,85 mm |
| Height H | 16 mm |
| Wrench size S | 50 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 22 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 22 |

### Further information

- [MF - ISO metric fine thread DIN 13](http://www.gewindebohrer.de/shoptabellen/mf_en.html)
- [Tolerances for dies, terms and dimension explanation](https://www.gewindebohrer.de/shoptabellen/pop_up_toleranzen_se_english.html)
- [Information on bolt pre-machining diameter](https://www.gewindebohrer.de/shoptabellen/blank_diameter_tolerances.html)
- [Guide values for cutting speed, cooling lubricant and rake angle](https://www.gewindebohrer.de/en/service/technische-daten/cutting-iron-cutting-speed)

### Safety instructions

- [Information on the EU General Product Safety Regulation (GPSR)](https://baer.tools/en/navigation/0193b1f5df9a730ca17ba750ed133848)

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut MF 16 x 1.5 - HSS

* * *

The hexagonal die (also called hexagon die nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut MF 16 x 1.5 - HSS

* * *

The hexagonal die (also called hexagon die nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². ## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut M 22 x 2.5 - HSS

* * *

The hexagonal die (also called hexagon die nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 22 mm |
| Diameter | 22 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,866 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 22 |
| Pitch | 2,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 2,5 |
| Dimension | M 22 x 2,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing Hexagon Die Nut](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 21,79 mm |
| Height H | 22 mm |
| Wrench size S | 50 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | M 22 x 2,5 |
| Diameter | 22 |

The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². ## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 30 x 1.5 - HSS

* * *

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. Round dies are cylindrical in shape and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to fasten the die in suitable die holder and holders by means of retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill. The external thread cutting tool is made of high speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 18 mm |
| Diameter | 30 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 1,181 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 30 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 30 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing round die](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 29,85 mm |
| Height H | 18 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 65 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 30 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 30 |

### Application – Sample materials for dies

| General construction steels |
| --- |
| 1.0035 | S185 (St33) |
| 1.0036 | S235JRH |
| 1.0039 | S235JRG1+CR |
| 1.0060 | E335 (St60-2) |

| Free-cutting steels |
| --- |
| 1.0718 | 11SMnPb30 |
| 1.0721 | 10S20 |
| 1.0726 | 35S20 |
| 1.0758 | 60SPb20 |

| Case-hardening steels |
| --- |
| 1.0401 | (C15) |
| 1.7016 | 17CR3 |
| 1.7131 | 16MnCr5 |
| 1.5919 | 15CrNi6 |

| Quenched and tempered steels unalloyed |
| --- |
| 1.0402 | C 22 |
| 1.1151 | C22E (Ck22) |
| 1.0503 | C 45 |
| 1.1191 | C45E (Ck45) |

| Pure copper, low-alloyed copper |
| --- |
| 2.0240 | CuZn15 |
| 2.0265 | CuZn30 |

| Copper-tin alloy (bronze) short-chipping |
| --- |
| 2.1090.01 | G-CuSn7ZnPb |
| 2.1086.01 | G-CuSn10Zn |

| Plastics |
| --- |
| PMMA |
| POM |
| PVC |

BAERCOIL


## M30 X 1.5 ROUND DIE

**$121.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 30 x 1.5 - HSS

* * *

The die is a reliable and durable tool that helps you to produce precise external threads in one operation. It is equipped with four holes and a V-groove that secure the die in matching die stock and holders. This allows you to handle the die safely and comfortably. The BAER round die is also perfect for use in a tailstock or chuck of a drill press. Dies are tools used for cutting screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday life. Round dies are cylindrical in shape and are used for making external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to fasten the die in suitable die holder and holders by means of retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill. The external thread cutting tool is made of high speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 18 mm |
| Diameter | 30 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 1,181 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 30 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 30 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing round die](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 29,85 mm |
| Height H | 18 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 65 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 30 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 30 |

| --- |
| PMMA |
| POM |
| PVC |

## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut M 10 x 1.5 - LEFT - HSS

* * *

The hexagon die nut is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, making it easier to reach inaccessible places. BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. This thread cutting nut has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. This is a left-hand cutting nut used to make left-hand thread. The hexagon die nut is made of high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 11 mm |
| Diameter | 10 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,394 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 10 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | M 10 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Left |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing Hexagon Die Nut](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 9,85 mm |
| Height H | 11 mm |
| Wrench size S | 27 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | M 10 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 10 |

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². ## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut UNC 5/16 x 18 - HSS

* * *

The hexagon die nut is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring or open-end spanners, making it easier to reach inaccessible places. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 9 mm |
| Diameter | 5/16 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,313 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 7,938 |
| Pitch | 18 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,411 |
| Dimension | UNC 5/16 x 18 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Tolerance | 2A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: 2A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

2A

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing Hexagon Die Nut](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 7,8 mm |
| Height H | 9 mm |
| Wrench size S | 22 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | UNC 5/16 x 18 |
| Diameter | 5/16 |

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut UNC 5/16 x 18 - HSS

* * *

The hexagon die nut is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring or open-end spanners, making it easier to reach inaccessible places. BAER dies are perfect for anyone who wants to cut external threads. Basically, this cutting tool has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Hexagonal die nuts are used to cut screws, nuts and threaded rods in everyday use. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 9 mm |
| Diameter | 5/16 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,313 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 7,938 |
| Pitch | 18 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,411 |
| Dimension | UNC 5/16 x 18 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Tolerance | 2A |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: 2A](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

2A

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 7,8 mm |
| Height H | 9 mm |

## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut MF 12 x 1.25 - HSS

* * *

The hexagon die nut is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, making it easier to reach inaccessible places. BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. This thread cutting nut has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 12 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,472 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 12 |
| Pitch | 1,25 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,25 |
| Dimension | MF 12 x 1,25 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing Hexagon Die Nut](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 11,86 mm |
| Height H | 10 mm |
| Wrench size S | 36 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 12 x 1,25 |
| Diameter | 12 |

###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## M12 X 1.25 Baer® HEX DIE -

**$67.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut MF 12 x 1.25 - HSS

* * *

The hexagon die nut is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, making it easier to reach inaccessible places. BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. This thread cutting nut has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 12 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,472 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 12 |
| Pitch | 1,25 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,25 |
| Dimension | MF 12 x 1,25 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing Hexagon Die Nut](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 11,86 mm |
| Height H | 10 mm |
| Wrench size S | 36 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 12 x 1,25 |
| Diameter | 12 |

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut MF 20 x 1.0 - HSS

* * *

The hexagonal die (also called hexagonal cutting nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. This metal-cutting tap has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The hexagon die nut is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 14 mm |
| Diameter | 20 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,787 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 20 |
| Pitch | 1,0 |
| Pitch in mm | 1 |
| Dimension | MF 20 x 1,0 |

### Characteristics

| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut MF 20 x 1.0 - HSS

* * *

The hexagonal die (also called hexagonal cutting nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². ## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut NPT 3/4 x 14 - HSS

The hexagon die nut is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, making it easier to reach inaccessible places. BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. This thread cutting nut has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The hexagon die nut is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 22 mm |
| Diameter | 3/4 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 26,57 |
| Pitch | 14 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,81 |
| Dimension | NPT 3/4 x 14 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | NPT: National Pipe Thread or American pipe thread according to ANSI B 1.20.1 |
| Tolerance | medium |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Bild Anschnitt: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Bild Material: https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Tolerance: medium](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

medium

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/f6/6f/f9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter_konische_Gewinde.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 25,95 x 17,1 mm |
| Height H | 22 mm |
| Wrench size S | 50 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | NPT 3/4 x 14 |
| Diameter | 3/4 |

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut NPT 3/4 x 14 - HSS

This thread cutting nut has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The hexagon die nut is made of the high-speed steel HSS, which has better toughness and is less susceptible to breakage than HSSE steel. HSS steel is also a popular material for making tools that are subjected to high stresses. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloyed copper and short-chipping copper-tin alloys. Also plastics such as POM, PVC etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

## Description

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut M 12 x 1.75 - HSS

* * *

The hexagonal die (also called hexagonal cutting nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. This metal-cutting tap has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 14 mm |
| Diameter | 12 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,472 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 12 |
| Pitch | 1,75 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,75 |
| Dimension | M 12 x 1,75 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing Hexagon Die Nut](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/d2/1e/b9/Technische_Zeichnung_Schneidmutter.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 11,83 mm |
| Height H | 14 mm |
| Wrench size S | 36 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | M 12 x 1,75 |
| Diameter | 12 |

BAERCOIL


## M12 x 1.75 Baer Hexagon Die Nut - HSS

**$37.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Hexagon Die Nut M 12 x 1.75 - HSS

* * *

The hexagonal die (also called hexagonal cutting nut) is particularly advantageous for repairs, as it can be moved with ring spanners or open-end spanners, allowing you to reach inaccessible places more easily. BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. This metal-cutting tap has an external hexagon and - depending on the size - has three or more cutting edges on the inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. The external thread cutting tool is made of high-speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS hexagonal die nuts can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 14 mm |
| Diameter | 12 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,472 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 12 |
| Pitch | 1,75 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,75 |
| Dimension | M 12 x 1,75 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Hexagon die nuts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 382 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- for recutting and repairing damaged threads
- good machinable materials up to 800 N/mm²
- in places that are difficult to access

M15 X 1.5 BAER ROUND DIE - 262646001 (P67)

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m15x15baerrounddie-262646001p67#product-info)

## Description

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 15 x 1.5 - HSS

* * *

BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. Round dies are cylindrical and are used to make external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to fasten the die in matching die stock and holders using retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill. The external thread cutting tool is made of high speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 15 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,591 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 15 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 15 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing round die](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 14,85 mm |
| Height H | 10 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 38 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 15 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 15 |

### Application – Sample materials for dies

| General construction steels |
| --- |
| 1.0035 | S185 (St33) |
| 1.0036 | S235JRH |
| 1.0039 | S235JRG1+CR |
| 1.0060 | E335 (St60-2) |

| Free-cutting steels |
| --- |
| 1.0718 | 11SMnPb30 |
| 1.0721 | 10S20 |
| 1.0726 | 35S20 |
| 1.0758 | 60SPb20 |

| Case-hardening steels |
| --- |
| 1.0401 | (C15) |
| 1.7016 | 17CR3 |
| 1.7131 | 16MnCr5 |
| 1.5919 | 15CrNi6 |

| Quenched and tempered steels unalloyed |
| --- |
| 1.0402 | C 22 |
| 1.1151 | C22E (Ck22) |
| 1.0503 | C 45 |
| 1.1191 | C45E (Ck45) |

| Pure copper, low-alloyed copper |
| --- |
| 2.0240 | CuZn15 |
| 2.0265 | CuZn30 |

| Copper-tin alloy (bronze) short-chipping |
| --- |
| 2.1090.01 | G-CuSn7ZnPb |
| 2.1086.01 | G-CuSn10Zn |

| Plastics |
| --- |
| PMMA |
| POM |
| PVC |

BAERCOIL


## M15 X 1.5 BAER ROUND DIE - 262646001 (P67)

**$42.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BAER Round Cutting Die MF 15 x 1.5 - HSS

* * *

BAER thread cutting dies are threading tools that are perfect for external threads. Basically, this cutting tool is cylindrical and has - depending on the size - three or more cutting edges inside. The holes between the cutting edges take up the chips, roll them and carry them away. Dies are commonly used in everyday life to make screws, nuts and threaded rods. Round dies are cylindrical and are used to make external threads in one operation. There are four holes and a groove on the outer casing of the round die, which are used to fasten the die in matching die stock and holders using retaining screws. External threads are cut by hand with die stock. Special die holders are used for the tailstock on a lathe or for the chuck of a drill. The external thread cutting tool is made of high speed steel (HSS). HSS steel has a higher toughness and a lower susceptibility to breakage compared to HSSE steel. HSS steel is known for its exceptional cutting performance and durability. HSS cutting dies can be used for a wide range of applications, such as structural steels, carbon steels and free-cutting steels. It is also suitable for case-hardening steels and unalloyed tempering steels with a strength of up to 750 N/mm². Cast steel as well as zinc alloys can also be cut with it, as well as pure copper, low-alloy copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys, plastics such as POM, PVC, etc. It is important that you lubricate the tool plumbed working and with cutting oil or cutting paste.

### Dimensions

| Height H | 10 mm |
| Diameter | 15 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,591 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 15 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,5 |
| Dimension | MF 15 x 1,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Round cutting die |
| Product type | Round cutting dies |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO-6g |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 223 (DIN EN 2256 |
| Material | HSS |

### Technical information - Cutting dies

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/75/83/18/schneideisen_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

1,5

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSS

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: ISO-6g](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

ISO-6g

### Applications

- General-purpose use up to 750 N/mm²
- general structural steels, free-cutting steels, case-hardening steels and unalloyed heat-treatable steels
- Pure copper, low-alloyed copper, as well as short-chipping copper-tin alloys
- Plastics such as POM, PVC, etc.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing round die](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/91/bf/e7/Technische_Zeichnung_Runde_Schneideisen.svg)

| Bolt pre-cutting diameter D2 | 14,85 mm |
| Height H | 10 mm |
| Outside diameter D1 | 38 mm |
| Dimension Diameter D | MF 15 x 1,5 |
| Diameter | 15 |

| --- |

| 1.0036 | S235JRH |
| 1.0039 | S235JRG1+CR |
| 1.0060 | E335 (St60-2) |

| Free-cutting steels |
| --- |

| 1.0721 | 10S20 |
| 1.0726 | 35S20 |
| 1.0758 | 60SPb20 |

| Case-hardening steels |

| 1.7131 | 16MnCr5 |
| 1.5919 | 15CrNi6 |

| Quenched and tempered steels unalloyed |
| --- |

| 1.1151 | C22E (Ck22) |

| 1.1191 | C45E (Ck45) |

| 2.1086.01 | G-CuSn10Zn |

| Plastics |
| --- |
| PMMA |
| POM |
| PVC |
